cast.original_title: カウボーイビバップ 天国の扉
cast.overview: The year is 2071. Following a terrorist bombing, a deadly virus is released on the populace of Mars and the government has issued the largest bounty in history, for the capture of whoever is behind it. The bounty hunter crew of the spaceship Bebop; Spike, Faye, Jet and Ed, take the case with hopes of cashing in the bounty. However, the mystery surrounding the man responsible, Vincent, goes deeper than they ever imagined, and they aren't the only ones hunting him.
cast.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie

cast.original_title: 僕のヒーローアカデミア THE MOVIE ～2人の英雄～
cast.overview: All Might and Deku accept an invitation to go abroad to a floating and mobile manmade city, called 'I-Island', where they research quirks as well as hero supplemental items at the special 'I-Expo' convention that is currently being held on the island. During that time, suddenly, despite an iron wall of security surrounding the island, the system is breached by a villain, and the only ones able to stop him are the students of Class 1-A.
cast.title: My Hero Academia: Two Heroes

details.biography:
Ai Kobayashi (born May 25, 1973) is a Japanese voice actress from Adachi, Tokyo.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Ai Kobayashi, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Ai Kobayashi
